title: ProgrammableWeb
body: Founded by John Musser in 2005, this platform currently acts as the largest API directory in the world. It posts about one or two dev blog articles daily about all things related to APIs.

title: The Daily WTF
body: This dev blog focuses on advising developers on what not to do. The writers post instances where they encountered inexcusably bad code in their personal day-to-day lives, and how those negatively affected their programs and projects.

title: Honeypot
body: This corporate dev blog aims at advising developers on their career development. They provide a great initiative for developers to receive career counseling no one probably gave them in person.

title: CodeIT
body: Look at this dev blog to get some awareness, opinions, and to explore use cases in the field of mobile & web development.
